name: fortuity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of something good happening by chance, rather than being planned, or an example of this: The victim's chances of getting compensation often depend more on fortuity than on any law. They were strangers who had been brought together by the fortuities of war.
More examplesFewer examplesFortuity brought them together when they worked on a film together.Once all those conditions have been met, you will still need a lot of fortuity.We discovered a strange fortuity: her mother and my father had been born in the same small town.
